text: SOLUTION: function MEMO-CHANGE(n) create a new array Soln[l..n] for ¢ from 1 to n do Soln[i] + —1 > or any other "flag" value return MEMO-CHANGE-HELPER(n) function MEMO-CHANGE-HELPER(Z) if i« <0 then return infinity else if i = 0 then return 0 else if i > 0 then if Soln[i] == —1 then Soln[i] « the minimum of: MEMO-CHANGE-HELPER(i — 25) + 1, MEMO-CHANGE-HELPER(i — 10) + 1, MEMO-CHANGE-HELPER(i — 1) + 1. return Soln[i]
